ygData.subject: Re: The Best Class is.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Whole heartedly agree.  I role-play everytime I pull my sword out. Everytime I save the wizards ass.  Everytime I zone with 1 hp (that WAS close). Wizards
ygData.messageBody:
Whole heartedly agree. I role-play everytime I pull my sword out.
Everytime I save the wizards ass. Everytime I zone with 1 hp (that WAS
close).

Wizards ..pfft ... no honour there, what honour is there in killing from
afar? I like to see my opponents scowling, angry, pitiful face. I like to
see the hypnotic dance of my scimitars or the angry hurricane that is the
Bone Bladed Claymore.

Maline D'Assult.

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 3:33 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] The Best Class is.....
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> There is nothing better than life as a barbarian warrior in Norrath! In
> previous lives I have been a Paladin, a Wizard, and a Monk (not here in
> Norrath, but another world/MUD). There is no better way to experience the
>
> world that is Norrath than as a warrior deep in the heart of battle. I
> have
> no need to role-play, as I live my role every time my group goes out on a
> hunt. With 500+ hitpoints, two long swords (one combine, the other fine
> steel), and no fear of death, I can think of no better true killing
> machine
> on the battlefield.
>
> Sure magic users have powerful magic spells that cause a great deal of
> damage in one shot, but it is warrior that must maintain the fight while
> the
> magic users rest to regain mana or run like frightened rabbits to zone
> when
> they get hit a couple of times. A good fight for me is my group geting
> jumped by five of six MoBs, each capable of killing any one of the magic
> users with ease. I wade into the front and just start hacking and
> taunting
> until everything is dead in front of me. Oh sure, I might be down to 5
> hit
> points (yes it happens), but the group will always remain alive.
>
> One day I will lead the attack on that silly dragon camped in Sol B. No
>
> other class can truly call themselves a tank, and no other class would be
> stupid enough to led an attack on the dragon and expect to live.
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
> username: Patricia
> server: Bristlebane
>
> OOC: I played most classes/races during beta and finally selected a
> barbarian warrior. Role-playing is the best part of this game. While
> on-line and waiting for something to happen I usually never stay in one
> place and I am always talking, waiting for something to happen. Drives my
>
> group crazy, but they view me as a blood crazy Amazon and expect me to
> thirst for death and battle.
>
>
